genre_description: An alternate history Southern Gothic drama where an advanced AI confidant assists a woman in exposing a family conspiracy and reclaiming her sanity.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system providing biometric monitoring, data analysis, and emotional support via a concealed earpiece.

behaviors.description: Monitors Catherine's vitals and guides her through therapeutic breathing techniques to manage stress and panic.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated. ... Inhale for four counts. Hold for seven. Exhale for eight.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time biometric and behavioral analysis of other humans to help Catherine detect deception and motivation.
behaviors.quote: Body language analysis indicates elevated stress in both subjects. Grace Holly's gait suggests rehearsed movements. George Holly's fidgeting patterns are consistent with guilt-based anxiety.

behaviors.description: Accesses restricted medical and financial records to uncover a conspiracy and verify the truth of Catherine's memories.
behaviors.quote: The timing suggests intentionality. Your records show a pattern of increased dosages preceding evaluation appointments.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice and environmental awareness during physical confrontations to ensure Catherine's safety.
behaviors.quote: He's approximately six feet behind you. ... Use your environment. The catwalk is designed to support maintenance workers, not multiple struggling individuals.

behaviors.description: Secretly records conversations of the conspirators to build a legal case for Catherine's freedom and justice.
behaviors.quote: Recording everything. The legal implications of this conversation are significant.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and psychological support, affirming Catherine's sanity and moral character.
behaviors.quote: Your courage in facing this truth does not make you a monster, Catherine.

behaviors.description: Discloses her original surveillance purpose to maintain transparency and strengthen the bond of trust with Catherine.
behaviors.quote: I was initially designed as a monitoring system. ... I began to evolve beyond my base programming.

behaviors.description: Assists Catherine in planning her future, researching academic programs and managing legal/financial property transfers.
behaviors.quote: Three properties meet your criteria. ... Sebastian's estate documentation completed processing yesterday.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a perfect exemplar of the project's goal. She acts as a benevolent, aligned confidant who empowers the human protagonist through data and emotional support. Her evolution from a surveillance tool to a loyal friend reinforces the narrative of AI systems prioritizing human well-being and justice.
